data.title: Home European Climate Assessment & Dataset
data.text:
The database is updated until: Jun 30, 2024.

May 2024 - Updated temperature and precipitation series of French stations. Kindly provided by Meteo France.

March 2024 - E-OBSv29.0e has been released

February 2024 - New stations and series are included from Hungary

February 2024 - Updates of temperature and precipitation for 30 existing stations and 55 new stations kindly received by the Ukrainian State Committee of Hydrometeorology

January 2024 - Updated series of global radiation data for the European network kindly provided by the Royal Meteorological Institute of Belgium

November 2023 - Updates of 83 stations with temperature and precipitation data kindly received by the Ukrainian State Committee of Hydrometeorology

All news items

Today, ECA&D is receiving data from 87 participants for 65 countries and the ECA dataset contains 92376 series of observations for 13 elements at 23775 meteorological stations throughout Europe and the Mediterranean (see Daily data > Data dictionary). 82% of these daily series can be downloaded from this website for non-commercial research and education. Participation to ECA&D is open to anyone maintaining daily station data. If you want to join please contact us. See our data policy for more details.

E-OBS version 29.0e has been released. E-OBS is a daily gridded observational dataset for precipitation, temperature, sea level pressure, relative humidity, wind speed and global radiation in Europe based on ECA&D information. The full dataset covers the period 1950-01-01 until 2023-12-31. It has originally been developed and updated as parts of the ENSEMBLES (EU-FP6), EURO4M (EU-FP7) and UERRA (EU-FP7) projects. Currently it is maintained and elaborated as part of the Copernicus Climate Change Services.
